meanings.definition: The quality or state of being clever or intelligent.
meanings.sent1: Her smartness in solving puzzles impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: His smartness in math helped him ace the test.
meanings.sent3: The robot showed its smartness by completing the task in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her smartness was like a shining beacon in the dark room of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The smartness of the detective led to the capture of the criminal.

meanings.definition: The ability to make quick and effective decisions.
meanings.sent1: In emergencies, his smartness in decision-making saved lives.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's smartness in business strategies grew the company rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The smartness of the cat in choosing the best hiding spot amazed the children.
meanings.sent4: Her smartness in choosing the right path through the maze was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The smartness of the coach in player substitutions turned the game around.

meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her smartness in dressing up for the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The designer's smartness in creating trendy outfits made them popular.
meanings.sent3: The smartness of his outfit made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her smartness in matching accessories with her outfit was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The smartness of the fashion show left the audience in awe.
